section_title:
20c02 - Performance
of work not within the exemption.
text:
For
enforcement purpose, an outside buyer will be considered exempt even though he
spends 20% or less of his time in the w/w in nonexempt activities.
html: For enforcement purpose, an outside buyer will be considered exempt even though he spends 20% or less of his time in the w/w in nonexempt activities.
